analysis.description:
TokenMacroansy.buyCoinsPreview (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#397-415) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- TokenMacroansy.msgSndr

Reentrancy in TokenMacroansy.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#225-241):
	External calls:
	- sucsSlrLmt = _chkSellerLmts(msg.sender,_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#230-231)
	- sucsByrLmt = _chkBuyerLmts(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#232)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#240)

TokenMacroansy.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#299-312) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-spender.receiveApproval(msg.sender,_valueA,this,_extraData) (/unique_chucks/24/0x0ff40d701e0bec9e79e1cbcb281d3f34376da740.sol#309-310)
